Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to hiring and promoting employees on a permanent basis at municipal and/or authority owned or operated airports
Summary: Authorizes the hiring and promotion of employees on a permanent basis at municipal and/or authority owned or operated airports.
LawCode: Amd ยง65, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to authorizing municipal and/or authority owned or operated airports to hire and promote employees on a permanent basis
